name: automattic/jetpackcrm
description: [Jetpack CRM](https://jetpackcrm.com) Core CRM Plugin - WordPress.org Hosted

scripts.cs: temp=$(git diff --diff-filter=d --name-only trunk HEAD | grep '.php'); [[ -n $temp ]] && phpcs-changed -s --always-exit-zero --git --git-base trunk $temp || echo 'No changes found.'
scripts.cs-security: temp=$(git diff --diff-filter=d --name-only trunk HEAD | grep '.php'); [[ -n $temp ]] && phpcs-changed -s --standard=phpcs.security.xml$([[ ! -f phpcs.security.xml ]] && echo .dist) --always-exit-zero --git --git-base trunk $temp || echo 'No changes found.'
scripts.cs-staged: temp=$(git diff --diff-filter=d --name-only --cached | grep '.php'); [[ -n $temp ]] && phpcs-changed -s --always-exit-zero --git --git-staged $temp || echo 'No changes found.'
scripts.cs-unstaged: temp=$(git diff --diff-filter=d --name-only | grep '.php'); [[ -n $temp ]] && phpcs-changed -s --always-exit-zero --git --git-unstaged $temp || echo 'No changes found.'
